panels.description: Displays the roles of each node per partition.
panels.title: Topology

panels.description: Shows accumulated health per partition
panels.title: Health

panels.description: Shows when and how often a pod was restarted.  The graph is zero when the pod is ready. With this it is also possible to determine how long it take for the pod to come ready again.
panels.title: Pod Restarts

panels.description: Shows the count of blacklisted process instances of the namespace.
panels.title: Blacklisted instances

panels.description: Requests which hit the gateway and a response have been sent to the client per second.
panels.title: Requests handled by Gateway per sec

panels.description: Flow node instances completed or terminated per second over all partitions.
panels.title: Overall FNI  per s

panels.description: Shows the current processed records
panels.title: Current Events

panels.description: Takes the avg of all completed tasks per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Completed Tasks in avg overtime per sec

panels.description: Takes the avg of all completed processes per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Completed Processes in avg overtime per sec

panels.description: Memory limits and requests are taken from the k8 pod metrics.
panels.title: Process memory usage

panels.description: Shows the processing queue size over time. Processing queue defines, what is already appended but not yet processed by the stream processor.

targets.expr: max by (partition) (zeebe_log_appender_last_appended_position{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}) - max by (partition) (zeebe_stream_processor_last_processed_position{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"})

panels.title: Processing Queue size

panels.description: Show the distribution of commands in the batches over time
panels.title: Batch processing command count

panels.description: Shows how often we have retried batch processing due to reaching the maximum batch size.
panels.title: Number of batch processing retries

panels.description: Shows how many positions are not updated by exporters per partition. Means what is the difference between last committed exporter position and committed log position.

targets.expr: max by (exporter, pod, partition) (zeebe_exporter_last_exported_position{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}) - max by (exporter, pod, partition) (zeebe_exporter_last_updated_exported_position{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"})

panels.title: Number of records exported but not acknowledged

panels.description: Shows the position, which was appended last by the leader per partition.
panels.title: Last appended position

panels.description: Shows the last committed log position.
panels.title: Last committed position

panels.description: Shows how many records are not exported yet.

targets.expr: max (zeebe_log_appender_last_committed_position{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}) by (partition) - max (zeebe_exporter_last_exported_position{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition", exporter="elasticsearch"}) by (partition)

panels.title: Number of records not exported

panels.description: Shows the last exported position which was committed by the given exporter per partition.
panels.title: Last updated exported position

panels.description: Shows the last processed position by the stream processor per partition.
panels.title: Last processed position

panels.description: Shows the last replayed source position by the stream processor per partition and pod
panels.title: Last replayed source position

panels.description: Shows how many records the stream processor has not processed yet.

targets.expr: max by (partition) (zeebe_log_appender_last_committed_position{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}) - max by (partition) (zeebe_stream_processor_last_processed_position{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"})

panels.title: Number of records not processed

panels.description: Shows the last exported position per partition.
panels.title: Last exported position

panels.description: Shows the count of blacklisted process instances per partition.
panels.title: Blacklisted instances by partition

panels.description: Processed commands by the leading Stream Processor
panels.title: Processed Commands

panels.description: Exported Records by the leading Stream Processor
panels.title: Exported Records

panels.description: Replayed events by the following Stream Processor
panels.title: Replayed Events

panels.description: Shows the process instance creation rate over all partitions in the namespace. It will only count root process instances, so call activity process instance creations are excluded.
panels.title: Process instance creation per second

panels.description: Shows the process instance completion rate over all partitions in the namespace. It will only count root process instances, so call activity process instance creations are excluded.
panels.title: Process instance completion per second

panels.description: Shows the Job creation rate over all partitions in the namespace
panels.title: Job creation per second

panels.description: Shows the Job completion rate over all partitions in the namespace.
panels.title: Job completion per second

panels.description: Total number of committed snapshots on disk
panels.title: Snapshot Count

panels.description: Approximate duration of taking a single snapshot from the processor point-of-view (without replication or committing).
panels.title: Snapshot Operation Duration

panels.description: Size in bytes of snapshots on disk
panels.title: Snapshot Size

panels.description: Distribution of snapshot file sizes - each snapshot may be comprised of many files, and this shows approximately how "big" files there are and how many "small" files.
panels.title: Snapshot Files Sizes (1m)
Number of files in a snapshot

panels.description: Memory limits and requests are taken from the k8 pod metrics.
panels.title: Process memory usage

panels.description: Shows the number of garbage collections (GC) per second, aggregated per pod and GC type.
panels.title: GC Count per second

panels.description: Shows the garbage collection (GC) time proportion per second. Means shows the rate which is spent in GC in a second.
panels.title: GC proportion per second

panels.description: Current thread count of a JVM, aggregated by namespace and pod
panels.title: JVM Thread count

panels.description: Shows the bytes read per second for the zeebe pods in the select namespace.
panels.title: Read bytes/s

panels.description: Shows the written bytes per second by the Zeebe pods in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Written bytes/s

panels.description: Shows how many bytes the Zeebe Pods transmit per second in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Network bytes/s transmitted

panels.description: Shows how many bytes the Zeebe Pods have received per second in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Network bytes/s received

panels.description: Shows the general latency for request-responses in zeebe.
panels.title: Request response latency

panels.description: Shows the general request size distribution
panels.title: Request size distribution

panels.description: Shows the general latency for request-responses in zeebe.
panels.title: Request response latency quantiles

panels.description: Shows the general latency for request-responses in zeebe.
panels.title: Request size quantiles

panels.description: Shows the execution time of a process instance. This means the time (latency) between creating the instance and completing it.
panels.title: Process Instance Execution Time

panels.description: Shows the execution time of a process instance. This means the time (latency) between creating the instance and completing it.
panels.title: Process Instance Execution Time (avg)

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between creating the job and activating it.
panels.title: Job Activation Time

panels.description: Shows the complete lifetime of an job. This means the time (latency) between creating the job and completing it.
panels.title: Job Life Time

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between writing the command to the dispatcher and processing the record.
panels.title: Overall Processing Latency

panels.description: Time taken to process a record
panels.title: Record Processing Duration

panels.description: Time taken to replay a batch of events
panels.title: Batch Event Replay Duration

panels.description: Time spent executing post-commit tasks after batch processing (in seconds)
panels.title: Post commit task execution duration

panels.description: Time spent in processing a batch of commands (excluding transaction commit, side effects, etc.)
panels.title: Batch processing duration (in seconds)

panels.description: Shows the quantiles of: time taken to commit a record to the log (includes write latency)
panels.title: Commit Latency Quantiles

panels.description: Shows the quantiles of: time taken to append a record to the log
panels.title: Record Write Quantiles

panels.description: Time taken to commit a record to the log (includes write latency)
panels.title: Commit latency

panels.description: Time taken to append a record to the log
panels.title: Record write latency

panels.description: Shows counts of all gRPC messages, which have been sent to the Zeebe Cluster.
panels.title: Total gRPC requests

panels.description: Shows the latency (RTT) of a sent from the gateway to the broker.
panels.title: Gateway Request Latency

panels.description: Shows rate of each error type.
panels.title: Failure Error Code

panels.description: Shows failure rate of requests sent from gateway to the broker.

targets.expr:
sum by (requestType) (rate(zeebe_gateway_failed_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}[$__rate_interval])) / 
sum by (requestType) (rate(zeebe_gateway_total_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Failure Rate by Request Type

panels.description: Shows the rate of different raft requests send from the leader to different followers
panels.title: Raft requests per second

panels.description: How many entries are committed per second
panels.title: Leader commit rate

panels.description: Rate in KiB at which we append data on followers
panels.title: Leader append data rate

panels.description: Rate of entries we append data on followers, counting entries, per partition, per follower
panels.title: Leader append rate

panels.description: The rate, in KiB/s, of data appended to the local journal
panels.title: Journal append data rate

panels.description: The rate of entries appended to the local journal (by entry count), per pod, per partition
panels.title: Journal append rate

panels.description: Time spent appending in the local journal
panels.title: Journal append latency

panels.description: Quantile distribution of time spent appending in the journal, per partition, per pod
panels.title: Journal append latency

panels.description: Time spent pre-allocating a segment
panels.title: Segment Allocation Time

panels.description: Time spent updating the last written index
panels.title: Last Written Index Update

panels.description: Shows the total count of send install requests from the leader to the followers
panels.title: Total install requests send

panels.description: Approximate Install RPC as measured by the follower.
panels.title: Snapshot Replication Duration

panels.description: Ongoing snapshot replications per partition, from the follower point-of-view.
panels.title: Snapshot Replications

panels.description: Overall latency distribution to flush the journal
panels.title: Journal Flush Latency

panels.description: Overall latency to flush the complete journal
panels.title: Journal Flush Latency

panels.description: Overall latency distribution to flush a single segment
panels.title: Segment Flush Latency

panels.description: Overall latency of flushing a single segment
panels.title: Segment Flush Latency

panels.description: Shows when a role change has happened
panels.title: Role changes over time

panels.description:
Shows when a role change has happened. 
1 = Follower
2 = Candidate
3 = Leader
2 -
panels.title: Role changes over time

panels.description: The number of locally appended but non committed records on the leader per partition (p)
panels.title: Non committed records

panels.description: The number of records a follower is lagging behind for a given partition (p) and follower (f)
panels.title: Non replicated records

panels.description: Number of batches in the sequencer's queue
panels.title: Sequencer Queue Size

panels.description: Shows the distribution of the # of entries per batch
panels.title: Sequencer Batch Entry Count

panels.description: Shows the distribution of the size of each enqueued batch, in kilobytes.
panels.title: Sequencer Batch Size (KB)

panels.description: Sum of memtable, table reader and cache memory capacity.

targets.expr: (sum(zeebe_rocksdb_memory_estimate_table_readers_mem{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", partition=~"$partition"}) by (pod, partition)) + (sum(zeebe_rocksdb_memory_size_all_mem_tables{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod",  partition=~"$partition"}) by (pod, partition)) + (sum(zeebe_rocksdb_memory_block_cache_capacity{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", partition=~"$partition"}) by (pod, partition)) + (sum(rate(zeebe_rocksdb_live_estimate_num_keys{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod",  partition=~"$partition"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, partition) * 10)

panels.title: RocksDB Memory usage

panels.description: Estimated total number of keys in the database per column family
panels.title: Estimated Number of Keys

panels.description: Estimated amount of live data in bytes per column family
panels.title: Estimated Live Data

panels.description:
Returns approximate size of active, unflushed immutable, and pinned immutable memtables (bytes) per partition.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L807
panels.title: Approx. size of all mem tables

panels.description:
Approximate size of active and unflushed immutable memtables (bytes) per partition.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L803
panels.title: Approx. current all mem table size

panels.description:
Approximate size of active memtable (bytes) per partition.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L799
panels.title: Approx. current active mem table size

panels.description: The block cache capacity per column family
panels.title: Block cache capacity

panels.description:
The current usage of the block cache per column family

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/618bf638aabce21262228509e9f99c1c13de2b57/include/rocksdb/cache.h#L261
panels.title: Block cache usage

panels.description:
The current pinned usage of the block cache per column family

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/618bf638aabce21262228509e9f99c1c13de2b57/include/rocksdb/cache.h#L261
panels.title: Pinned block cache usage

panels.description:
Total size (bytes) of all SST  files belong to the latest LSM tree.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L882
panels.title: Total size of live SST files

panels.description:
Total size (bytes) of all SST files.

WARNING: may slow down online queries if there are too many files.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L878
panels.title: Total size of all SST files

panels.description:
Return 1 if write has been stopped.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L908
panels.title: Write stopped

panels.description:
The current actual delayed write rate. 0 means no delay.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L905
panels.title: Actual write delay rate

panels.description: Return sum of number of entries in all the immutable mem tables.
panels.title: Number of entries in immutable mem Tables

panels.description:
Returns the number of currently running flushes.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L783
panels.title: Running flush

panels.description:
The number of currently running compactions.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L791
panels.title: Running compactions

panels.description:
Returns estimated memory used for reading SST tables, excluding memory used in block cache (e.g., filter and index blocks).

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L832
panels.title: Table Reader Memory

panels.description: The rate of failure of flush operations, averaged over 15s intervals
panels.title: Elasticsearch Exporter (Flush Failure Rate)

panels.description: Time taken to start and bootstrap partition servers.
panels.title: Atomix Partition Server Startup time

panels.description: The time needed to install all leader services on a newly elected leader until it is ready to process new requests.
panels.title: Leader transition duration

panels.description: Time taken to recover and reprocess events
panels.title: Streamprocessor Recovery Time

targets.expr: max by (partition) (rate(zeebe_backup_operations_latency_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod", partition=~"$partition", operation="take"}[1h]) / rate(zeebe_backup_operations_latency_count{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod", partition=~"$partition", operation="take"}[1h]))

panels.description: Execution time of a certain actor task.
panels.title: Actor Task Execution Latency

panels.description: The time between scheduling and executing a job.
panels.title: Actor Job Scheduling Latency

panels.description: Execution time of a certain actor task instance and completing it.
panels.title: Actor Task Execution Latency

panels.description: The time between scheduling and executing a job.
panels.title: Actor Job Scheduling Latency

panels.description: Number of times a certain actor task was executed successfully.
panels.title: Actor Task Execution Count

panels.description: The length of the job queue for an actor task.
panels.title: Actor Task Queue Length

panels.description: Shows the execution time of the swim protocol probe.
panels.title: Swim Probe Latency

panels.description: Members Incarnation number. This metric shows the incarnation number of each member in the several nodes. This is useful for observing the time taken for each member's information propagation.
panels.title: Swim Protocol Member Incarnation Number
